originalText.text:
He is a well known doctor referred to by my neurologist who world known for Multiple Sclerosis.
His reputation proceeds him.
At this point he's collecting all of my medical history in order to make a diagnosis.
Being a nurse,I'm picky but I feel so relieved knowing that he's so thorough.

originalText.text: First visit Dr. Kaner. He examined my lung xray from 2018, 2020, and 2023, day before my appointment,  he told me my right lung bottom of nodule was probably caused by my stomach reflexes which was exactly what happened,  I never told him that! No any medical doctor can crosses diagnose by symptoms of  had years. So impressed by his high levels of medical knowledges, and cared for his patients!!

originalText.text: Dr Kaner’s high level of expertise gives me confidence in his care plans. His explanations are at a level I can understand and he listens closely and responds to my concerns.

text.text: Dr Kaner’s high level of expertise gives me confidence in his care plans. His explanations are at a level I can understand and he listens closely and responds to my concerns.

originalText.text: As an Ivy-educated attorney for 40+ years, I can easily spot a professional at the top of his/her field. Dr. Kaner is such a medical specialist. It is rare when I place my complete trust in a doctor (and I have had many). So delighted that he's diagnosing my case!

originalText.text: Dr. Kaner is smart, thoughtful, curious, and patient. I like him and I trust him.
